document_data.caption: A map showing Tulmaster's Street and surroundings in the Southern Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Tulmaster's Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Tulmaster's Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Tulmaster's Street was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]]. The road branched south from the [[Rising Ride]] near the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]]. Tulmaster's Street then passed southeast for several blocks before ending on [[Caravan Street]] just north of [[Tilman's Lane]]. The road also connected with [[Sethma's Court]] and [[Tezambril's Street]].
document_data.Notable Locations: [[Coach & Wagon Hall]] and [[Saddlers' & Harness-Makers' Hall]] sat at opposite sides of the intersection of Tulmaster's Street with the Rising Ride.
